lines: LORD, DISMISS US WITH THY BLESSING
1. Hosi Ha Famba Hi He Minkateko, U Hi Tata Hi Ntsako;
Hi Nyike Rirhandzu, Hlula Hi Nsovo, U Hi Pfuxelela Yesu;
Hi He Matimba Yo Tiyisela, Hi Famba Emananga Ya vutomi.
2. Ha Khensa No Dzunisa Wena Yesu, Hikwalaho Ka Vhangeli;
Mihandzu Ya Kona Ku Hlawuriwa, Yi Vonakala Ka Hina;
A Hi Tshembhekeni NKarhi Hinkwawo, Hi Hanya Entiyisweni Wa Yena.
3. Loko Masiku Ya Hina Yo Hanya, Ya Andza Emisaveni;
Hi Nyika Ntsako, Ntshembo Na Matimba, Hi Khana Hi Nga Karhali;
Ku Kondza Hi Ta Vona Ku kwetsima, Loko Wo Matilo Ya Pfuleka.
